category.name: Food & Restaurants
category.description: Restaurants, catering, food delivery, and culinary services

templates.label: Restaurant Recommendation
templates.template: Love great food? Book a table and taste our chef’s favourites—fresh, local, and generous. {url}

templates.label: Catering Services
templates.template: Planning an event? Seamless catering—menus, delivery, and setup handled end-to-end. {url}

templates.label: Food Delivery
templates.template: Dinner sorted—fresh, hot delivery with easy online ordering and fast drop-off. {url}

templates.label: Pizza Special
templates.template: Craving pizza? Hand-stretched bases, big toppings, and hot deals tonight. {url}

templates.label: Bakery Fresh
templates.template: From the oven to you—fresh breads and pastries baked each morning. {url}

templates.label: Coffee Shop
templates.template: Need a pick-me-up? Specialty coffee, friendly baristas, and a cosy spot to unwind. {url}

templates.label: Healthy Options
templates.template: Clean, tasty, satisfying—healthy menu options that actually fill you up. {url}

templates.label: BBQ Specialties
templates.template: Low ’n slow done right—smoked meats, bold sauces, and proper portions. {url}

templates.label: Seafood Fresh
templates.template: Daily catch, expertly cooked—fresh seafood with bright, seasonal sides. {url}

templates.label: Dessert Heaven
templates.template: Got a sweet tooth? Indulgent desserts baked fresh—treat yourself tonight. {url}

templates.label: Meal Prep Service
templates.template: Healthy eating made easy—fresh meal prep by the week with clear macros. {url}

templates.label: Food Truck
templates.template: Street eats done right—follow the truck for today’s location and specials. {url}

templates.label: Wine & Dine
templates.template: Make it a night—thoughtful wine pairings and a chef’s tasting menu to match. {url}

templates.label: Breakfast Special
templates.template: Start strong—hearty breakfasts, great coffee, and weekend brunch specials. {url}

templates.label: Vegan Options
templates.template: Plant-based and flavour-packed—proper vegan dishes with satisfying portions. {url}

templates.label: International Cuisine
templates.template: Taste the world—authentic flavours and regional specials from our chef’s travels. {url}

templates.label: Happy Hour
templates.template: After-work plans? Happy hour drinks and bites—bring the crew. {url}

templates.label: Farm to Table
templates.template: Local farms, seasonal menus—fresh ingredients cooked with care. {url}

templates.label: Cooking Classes
templates.template: Sharpen your skills—hands-on cooking classes led by our chefs. {url}

templates.label: Food Festival
templates.template: See you at the festival—great food stalls, live vibes, and plenty to try. {url}
